constraints.name: xor_subarray_constraint
constraints.description: 子数组的异或和等于给定值 d 的区间数量需要最小化
constraints.formal: minimize |{[l, r] : L_i ≤ l ≤ r ≤ R_i, ⊕_{i=l}^r a_i = d}|

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 操作次数限制，即在 k 天内完成阅读

constraints.name: partition
constraints.description: 将 n 个章节划分成最多 k 个连续的子序列（可以有空闲天数）
constraints.formal: partition n chapters into at most k contiguous subsequences (allowing idle days)
